description:
With a little help from their fishy mates, the Straw Hats make it to the auction house in time to save Camie, but explosive elements prevent them from taking her back by force. Luckily, Nami’s concocted a very generous plan!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le temps nous est compté. La vente aux enchères des humains a commencé
Time Limit: The Human Auction Begins
Время на исходе – начинается Людской аукцион
タイムリミット 人間[ヒューマン]オークション開幕
